fact-2.value: Bodycote is the world’s leading provider of thermal processing services. As the partner of choice for many of the world’s most respected manufacturing companies, our purpose is to provide a vital link in the manufacturing process that makes the products our customers manufacture fit-for-purpose. With our breadth of solutions across multiple technologies, we create value through superior customer service for our customers across aerospace, defence, energy, automotive and general industrial markets. Our unique business model, expertise and global infrastructure mean we can adapt to our many customers’ needs and continue to deliver long-term success for our shareholders and other stakeholders.
